security_caveats: Tier 2 relay can observe plaintext transiently during SMTP ingest before encrypt-on-ingest.
Static recipient-key envelope encryption does not provide forward secrecy.
SMTP sender-side TLS authentication is best-effort unless DANE and/or MTA-STS are deployed by peer domains.
notes: Sisumail is receive-only mail infrastructure; outbound internet email sending is intentionally unsupported.
